1527351127_19Qid9uyfWCTmx2cUpDboEKCscRd4.body: I am Chinese, and I saw a TV debate at a very young age on the topic of whether AIDS was a medical problem or a social problem. I thought it was a medical problem. I thought it was a social problem when I grew up. Law can not really control crimes, but requires morality, religion and good humanity.

1_1BG8WrV2VY1bNjQiKR4tcL52FAw6Y6BoJ8.body: 即使失败了也没有什么，要知道linux失败的版本更多，但依然有优秀的linux版本存活了下来，这本身就是个优胜劣汰的过程，一切都是在总结经验，ipfs说不定就能吸取zeronet的经验和教训。
